text: Denis Pelizzari (born 11 September 1960) is a French former cyclist. He competed in the individual road race and the team time trial events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of France Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Denis Pelizzari
